summary: REQ-28 appears implemented by updating the AuthScreen "Continue with Google" anchor to open https://mail.google.com in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer" preserved. REQ-29 (delivering/exporting the full buildable project source, including frontend+backend and configs) cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary; backend delivery/config completeness is not evidenced. Several non-requested documentation/metadata files were added/modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide/export the full project source code as a complete, buildable project (frontend + backend) reflecting the Gmail-link change.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows changes/additions to frontend documentation/metadata and one frontend screen. It does not provide evidence that the complete project source (including backend directory and required config files like frontend/.env.example) is included/delivered or updated as part of this change.
evidence: <file-diff> shows only: ADDED frontend/README.md; MODIFIED frontend/src/screens/AuthScreen.tsx, frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json; no backend/ directory files shown

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new frontend/README.md with extensive feature/tech-stack documentation that was not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the Google button link destination and to deliver the existing full project source; it did not request new documentation files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/added project metadata files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) containing broad feature descriptions beyond the requested Gmail link change.
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are not part of REQ-28 and do not contribute to changing the "Continue with Google" link destination; they were not requested.
